Add Yaafi: Yet Another Avalon Framework Implementation. Yaafi is a lightweight container that we can use as we port to Avalon components on the way to Turbine 2.4. This is a tool that will faciliatate adding your own components into Scarab.
Import Fulcrum PRE_AVALON branch of code into Scarab CVS.

SCB1025 (Originally provided by Peter McTaggart): Added Date attribute type, with a popup calendar to enter the values. The Date fields will be manually editable only if scarab.datefield.editable=true
The property scarab.dataexport.encoding will now be used for the XML generated when exporting setting or issues. If not defined, UTF-8 will be explicitly used.
Maven can now be used to perform ALL build steps.

Added basic workflow functionalities, allowing restriction of transitions between different values of dropdown-list fields depending on the user's role. Also included the ability to conditionally require a field depending on the value of another in the issue.
Deleted users no longer can be assigned to an issue.
Simplify logic for using a standard i10n key in a .vm that is custom per screen. Removed an entire level of indirection and abstraction that was not used in Scarab.
Delete user functionality implemented! You can now "delete" a user, which means they can't login anymore, but the record still exists.
Application Configuration Screen that allows administrators to modify the application settings for Scarab without editing .properties files.
Improvements to VelocityEmailService
Whitespace from templates get squashed in emails
SCB1231 - NPE exception in ResourceBundle resolver, when Browser locale was not supported by Scarab. Problem occured only on Windows platforms.
SCB1227 - Issue attachments can now be physically deleted from disk, when the attachments are removed from an issue.
SCB1120 - Most of the text entry input boxes now fill the width of the page, resizing with the browser window.
Registration Email is generated with the correct characterset from the configuration.
The default characterset has been changed from dynamic to UTF-8. This is necessary, when the ResourceBundle resolver mixes resources from different Locales (e.g. korean and english).
Scarab now searches the ResourceBundles following all browser specified Locales in user prefered order. Ensure, that Scarab resolves unresolved references from the english ResourceBundle.
SCB1131 - No longer get an error on the "possible duplicates found" screen on systems lacking the sample data.
SCB670 - Query results screen now honours the number of results per page, the sort column and the sort polarity from a saved query.
SCB544 - Dates can now be entered into the advanced query screen in the user's locale, rather than in the US date format.
SCB1065 - the admin user can now change their own details, although they can no longer change users' passwords.
Integrated Peter's scarab properties xml file to generate as part of the site docs.
Localised most (if not all) of the remaining unlocalised messages, excluding exceptions.
Updated Scarab to use the latest Turbine 3. Turbine 3 (and T2.3) use a log4j.properties file for configuring logging. Fixes the logs not showing up problem.
Removed references to Turbine Scheduler that wasn't used.
If you are using Ant1.6, you get a nice error message. Need to use Ant 1.5.4 right now.
Renamed the locale resource bundles to minimise duplicates and to follow a more standard form.
Revamped the site docs to be in xdoc format. Integrated the existing docbook formatted admin guides. Added a tasks.xml file to track the roadmap to 1.0.
SCB1030 Added a valve that updates the database with the user's preferred locale if it changes. The check is done each request, and the locale is used to generate e-mails in the correct language.
Add goal scarab:sample that leverages NSIS to create an installer for windows that bundles a Scarab, Hypersonic, and Tomcat. This is already to install and run!
First cut at using Hypersonic as the embedded database. The database must manually be started via a batch file, but then can be used for running unit tests or sampling the webapp.
Generate into the WEB-INF/sql/ directory all the SQL DDL scripts for all the databases supported by Scarab.
ConfigurationFactory is now used! Provides ability to define at runtime which sources of Configuration data to check. You can now override ANY property set in TR.props.
SCB1072 getRModuleAttributes() and getRIssueTypeAttributes() have been modified to return empty lists, rather than null, if no attributes exist in the group.
Reorganized all the webapp assets under /src/webapp. Allows easy inplace development. Additionally, you can now use either Ant or Maven!
